Detailed Description

Detection trajectory; a line which associates the last detections. The data is stored in 2 "shift registers"

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

tld::Trajectory::Trajectory (  ) 

Constructor; don't forget to call init(length) afterwards

Member Function Documentation

void tld::Trajectory::addPoint ( CvPoint  point,
CvScalar  color 
)

Adds a new point to the trajectory. If you want to add a "place holder" point just add a cvPoint(-1, -1) and cvScalar(-1 , -1, -1)

Parameters:
point point which specifies the location of the point
color defines the color (confidence) of the point
